#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Stack primitives =

in order of importance:

|| *Forth*         || *Description*                 ||
|| CALL (label)    || %-1 = PC, RS↑, BRANCH (label) ||
|| RET             || BRANCH %0, RS↓                ||
|| BRANCH (label)  || BRANCH (label)                ||
|| ?BRANCH (label) || BRANCH $0 (label), PS↓        ||
|| NEXT (label)    || BRANCH %0 (label)             ||
|| LIT (number)    || $-1 = 12345, PS↑       ||
|| +     || $0 = add $1, $0; PS↓ ||
|| -     || $0 = sub $1, $0; PS↓ ||
|| ∗     || $0 = mul $1, $0; PS↓ ||
|| AND   || $0 = and $1, $0; PS↓ ||
|| OR    || $0 = or  $1, $0; PS↓ ||
|| XOR   || $0 = xor $1, $0; PS↓ ||
|| 2∗    || $0 = shl  $0, 1      || 
|| u2/   || $0 = lshr $0, 1      ||
|| 2/    || $0 = ashr $0, 1      ||
|| @     || $0 = load $0         ||
|| !     || store $0, $1; PS↓↓   ||
|| DROP  || PS↓                  ||
|| DUP   || $-1 = $0, PS↑        ||
|| OVER|| $-1 = $1, PS↑        ||
|| >R    || %-1 = $0, PS↓, RS↑   ||
|| R>    || $-1 = %0, PS↑, RS↓   ||
